words.source: H428 (אֵלֶּה, 'these'), conjunction + demonstrative pronoun common plural; KJV 'And these are', ESV 'These are', NASB 'These are'
H8034 (שֵׁם, 'name'), noun common masculine plural construct; KJV 'the names of', ESV 'the names of', NASB 'the names of'
H1121 (בֵּן, 'son'), noun common masculine plural construct; KJV 'the sons of', ESV 'the sons of', NASB 'the sons of'
H3878 (לֵוִי, 'Levi'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Levi'

H8435 (תּוֹלְדוֹת, 'generations'), preposition-lamed + noun common feminine plural construct + 3mp suffix; KJV 'according to their generations', ESV 'according to their generations', NASB 'according to their generations'
H1648 (גֵּרְשׁוֹן, 'Gershon'), proper noun; KJV 'Gershon', ESV 'Gershon', NASB 'Gershon'
H6955 (קְהָת, 'Kohath'), conjunction + proper noun; KJV 'and Kohath', ESV 'Kohath', NASB 'Kohath'
H4847 (מְרָרִי, 'Merari'), conjunction + proper noun; KJV 'and Merari', ESV 'and Merari', NASB 'and Merari'
H8141 (שָׁנָה, 'year'), conjunction + noun common feminine dual construct; KJV 'And the years of', ESV 'The length of', NASB 'The length of'
H2416 (חַי, 'life/living'), noun common masculine plural construct; KJV 'the life of', ESV 'Levi's life', NASB 'Levi's life'
H3878 (לֵוִי, 'Levi'), proper noun; KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Levi'
H7651 (שֶׁבַע, 'seven'), noun/numeral feminine; KJV/ESV/NASB all render as part of '137 years'
H7970 (שְׁלֹשִׁים, 'thirty'), conjunction + noun/numeral common plural; KJV/ESV/NASB all render as part of '137 years'
H3967 (מֵאָה, 'hundred'), conjunction + noun common feminine singular construct; KJV/ESV/NASB all render as part of '137 years'
H8141 (שָׁנָה, 'year'), noun common feminine singular absolute; KJV 'years', ESV 'years', NASB 'years'
